thread.title: Macron, Merkel lay out anti-Trump strategy in Davos

title: Macron, Merkel lay out anti-Trump strategy in Davos
text:
Macron, Merkel lay out anti-Trump strategy in Davos 4:40pm EST - 01:45 
French President Emmanuel Macron and German Chancellor Angela Merkel used separate speeches at the World Economic Forum in Davos to highlight Europe's plans to offset President Donald Trump's 'America First' rhetoric. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
French President Emmanuel Macron and German Chancellor Angela Merkel used separate speeches at the World Economic Forum in Davos to highlight Europe's plans to offset President Donald Trump's 'America First' rhetoric.
